name: SphereWorld
description:
SphereWorld is a small project that I have in mind for some time and after a few days of development here is a small demo of it ...

The game is made with Unreal Engine 4

You are an SpaceExplorer, who must recover technologies lost on différents planet to fulfill his objective.

For the moment, there is only a limited number of planets, effects and objective. But others are in developpement....
